KernelDensity
Public Function KernelDensity(
x,
Data,
Optional kernel = "gaussian",
Optional bandwidth = "Silverman"
)

Calculate the kernel density of a set of data at a point, x

Parameters
x

The point at with the densitity is to be calculated

Data

A vector of data

kernel
Optional

Name of the preferred kernel type

bandwidth
Optional

Name of the bandwidth algorithm to use

Return

The kernel density at x.

Violin
Public Function Violin(
Data,
Optional XorY = "Y",
Optional Position = 1,
Optional ScalingFactor = 1
)

Create a Violin Chart

Parameters
Data

a range of data

XorY
Optional

return the X or Y range

Position
Optional

for multiple datasets, where to position the center on the x axis

ScalingFactor
Optional

The amount to scale the width of the violin to prevent overlap

Returns

An array of Values.
